column1: Uchi////I'm so used to the super attentive service I get at Uchi/Ko that I had high expectations for my first visit in Houston. Usually it's "Sit down
column2: hot towels. Any sign of trash or dirty dish
column3: picked up immediately." But our waiter didn't come to the table for a good 5-10 minutes. We sat around waiting for him to come back to order
column4: he passed our table a few times
column5: had to flag him for the check
column6: then waited some more for him to pick up the card.
